title: List of all Android support  25 libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android support  25 libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: BreakingChangeInFragmentLifecycle
repoList.description: Important Changes in FragmentTransaction from Support Library 25.1.0

repoList.name: support-library-source-25.3.1
repoList.description: Source of android support library  from Google official

repoList.name: SupportLibRTLCrash
repoList.description: This repo contains a sample project demonstrating a crash in android support library version 25.1.0 when using TextInputLayout in the locale "ar_XB", which is the right-to-left psuedolocale

repoList.name: spring-animation-playground
repoList.description: Demos of the new SpringAnimation framework in the Android support library 25.3

repoList.name: animated-vector-bug-sample
repoList.description: This project shows a bug introduced in android support library version 25.0.0

repoList.name: BottomNavigationMenu
repoList.description: Today we are going to learn new design widget in Android naming Bottom Navigation View which has been added to version 25 of the Design Support Library.  The Bottom Navigation View has been in the material design guidelines for some time, but it hasn’t been easy for us to implement it into our apps. Some applications have built their own solutions, whilst others have relied on third-party open-source libraries to get the job done. Now the design support library is seeing the addition of this bottom navigation bar, let’s take a dive into how we can use it!
